languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Голос Джай тут же преображается{/d}, выдавая грубый гвардейский говор.{/n} "Жила-была девочка на куске камня, покрытом песком, в сердце которого таились несметные богатства для слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. И до шестнадцати лет эта девочка, надрывая легкие и спину, своими ручонками гребла блага для тех, кого никогда не видела и кто никогда о ней не узнает".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Джай тут же преображается, выдавая грубый гвардейский говор.{/n} "Жила-была девочка на куске камня, покрытом песком, в сердце которого таились несметные богатства для слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. И до шестнадцати лет эта девочка, надрывая легкие и спину, своими ручонками гребла блага для тех, кого никогда не видела и кто никогда о ней не узнает".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Jae's voice immediately drops{/d} to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n} "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Голос Джай тут же преображается{/d}, выдавая грубый гвардейский говор.{/n} "Жила-была девочка на куске камня, покрытом песком, в сердце которого таились несметные богатства для слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. И до шестнадцати лет эта девочка, надрывая легкие и спину, своими ручонками гребла блага для тех, кого никогда не видела и кто никогда о ней не узнает".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's voice immediately drops to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n}"Once upon a time there was a girl who lived on a sand-covered chunk of rock whose core held ungodly riches for the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out these riches with her little hands for those who never saw her and would never know or care until she was sixteen, breaking her back and coughing out her lungs every goddamn day."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's voice immediately drops to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n}"Once upon a time there was a girl who lived on a sand-covered chunk of rock whose core held ungodly riches for the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out these riches with her little hands for those who never saw her and would never know or care until she was sixteen, breaking her back and coughing out her lungs every goddamn day."

And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊的语调{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}立刻变得低沉下来{/d}，仿佛粗犷的士兵在咆哮。{/n}“很久以前，有个小女孩住在一块被沙子覆盖的岩石上。而岩石的核心区域，为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的仆人准备了不计其数的财富。那个女孩十六岁之前的每一天，都在努力地用她的小手回收那些财富。她的后背要累断了，肺里也灌满了沙子。她努力工作，仅仅是为了那些根本不会看她一眼，也不会知道她叫什么的人们。”
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Jae's voice immediately drops{/d} to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n} "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的语调立刻变得低沉，仿佛粗犷的士兵在咆哮。{/n}“很久以前，有个小女孩住在一块被沙子覆盖的岩石上。而岩石的核心区域，为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的仆人准备了不计其数的财富。那个女孩十六岁之前的每一天，都在努力地用她的小手回收那些财富。她的后背要累断了，肺里也灌满了沙子。她努力工作，仅仅是为了那些根本不会看她一眼，也不会知道她叫什么的人们。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae's voice immediately drops to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n} "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the Imperium. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}La voz de Jae se convierte de inmediato{/d} en el gruñido tosco de una soldado rasa.{/n} «Hace mucho tiempo, había una niña pequeña que vivía en una roca cubierta de arena cuyo núcleo contenía riquezas sin fin para los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Y cada día hasta que cumplió los dieciséis, la niña excavó esas riquezas con sus manitas, destrozándose la espalda y tosiendo trocitos de pulmón para el beneficio de gente que jamás la había visto y jamás sabría su nombre».
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Jae's voice immediately drops{/d} to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n} "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Jae se convierte de inmediato en el gruñido tosco de una soldado rasa.{/n} «Hace mucho tiempo, había una niña pequeña que vivía en una roca cubierta de arena cuyo núcleo contenía riquezas sin fin para los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Y cada día hasta que cumplió los dieciséis, la niña excavó esas riquezas con sus manitas, destrozándose la espalda y tosiendo trocitos de pulmón para el beneficio de gente que jamás la había visto y jamás sabría su nombre».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}ジェイの声はすぐ変化した{/d}。それは、軍隊の呻き声のような荒い唸り声だった。{/n}「昔々、砂に覆われた岩の塊の上に住んでいた少女がいた。その岩の核には、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のしもべのための計り知れない富が詰まっているとされていた。少女はその小さな手で富をかき出し、背中を壊し、肺を咳き込みながら、彼女を見たこともなく、彼女の名前を知ることもない人々のために働いた。彼女は16歳になるまで毎日そうしていた」
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Jae's voice immediately drops{/d} to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n} "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}ジェイの声はすぐ変化した{/d}。それは、軍隊の呻き声のような荒い唸り声だった。{/n}「昔々、砂に覆われた岩の塊の上に住んでいた少女がいた。その岩の核には、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のしもべのための計り知れない富が詰まっているとされていた。少女はその小さな手で富をかき出し、背中を壊し、肺を咳き込みながら、彼女を見たこともなく、彼女の名前を知ることもない人々のために働いた。彼女は16歳になるまで毎日そうしていた」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Jaes Stimme wird augenblicklich{/d} das grobe Knurren eines Fußsoldaten.{/n} "Es war einmal ein kleines Mädchen, das lebte auf einem sandbedeckten Felsen, und der Kern dieses Felsens enthielt atemberaubende Reichtümer für Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Und bis zu seinem sechzehnten Geburtstag kratzte das Mädchen diese Reichtümer mit den kleinen Händen aus dem Boden und zerstörte sich dabei den Rücken und die Lungen für Leute, die sie noch nie gesehen hatten und niemals ihren Namen kennen würden."
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Jae's voice immediately drops{/d} to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n} "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes Stimme verkommt augenblicklich zum groben Knurren eines Fußsoldaten.{/n} "Es war einmal ein kleines Mädchen, das lebte auf einem sandbedeckten Felsen, und der Kern dieses Felsens enthielt atemberaubende Reichtümer für Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Und bis zu seinem sechzehnten Geburtstag kratzte das Mädchen diese Reichtümer mit den kleinen Händen aus dem Boden und zerstörte sich dabei den Rücken und die Lungen für Leute, die sie noch nie gesehen hatten und niemals ihren Namen kennen würden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Jae adopte immédiatement{/d} la voix dure d'un soldat.{/n} « Il était une fois une petite fille qui vivait sur une planète couverte de sable dont le noyau renfermait des richesses incommensurables pour les serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Elle s'échinait à longueur de journée en crachant ses poumons pour extraire ces richesses avec ses petites mains, dans l'intérêt de gens qui n'avaient jamais posé les yeux sur elle et ne connaîtraient jamais son nom. Ainsi se déroulait sa vie jour après jour, jusqu'à ce qu'elle atteigne l'âge de seize ans. »
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Jae's voice immediately drops{/d} to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n} "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae adopte immédiatement la voix dure d'un soldat.{/n} « Il était une fois une petite fille qui vivait sur une planète couverte de sable dont le noyau renfermait des richesses incommensurables pour les serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Elle s'échinait à longueur de journée en crachant ses poumons pour extraire ces richesses avec ses petites mains, dans l'intérêt de gens qui n'avaient jamais posé les yeux sur elle et ne connaîtraient jamais son nom. Ainsi se déroulait sa vie jour après jour, jusqu'à ce qu'elle atteigne l'âge de seize ans. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın sesi anında sert bir askerden çıkan {d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}kaba bir hırıltıya dönüşüyor{/d}.{/n} "Bir varmış bir yokmuş, içi tıka basa kum dolu bir kayanın içinde yaşayan küçük bir kız varmış. Bu kayanın tam ortasında da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} hizmetkârları için akla hayale gelmeyecek hazineler saklıymış. On altı yaşına kadar kızın ömrü; kendisini bir kez olsun görmemiş, ismini asla bilmeyecek kişiler için o küçük elleriyle bu hazineleri çıkarmakla, sırtını parlamakla, ciğerleri çıkarcasına öksürmekle geçmiş."
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeRevealed}Jae's voice immediately drops{/d} to the rough growl of an army grunt.{/n} "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın sesi anında sert bir askerden çıkan kaba bir hırıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Bir varmış bir yokmuş, içi tıka basa kum dolu bir kayanın içinde yaşayan küçük bir kız varmış. Bu kayanın tam ortasında da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un hizmetkârları için akla hayale gelmeyecek hazineler bulunurmuş. On altı yaşına kadar kızın ömrü, onu bir kez olsun görmemiş, onun ismini asla bilmeyecek kişiler için o küçük elleriyle hazineler çıkarmakla, sırtını parlamakla, ciğerleri çıkarcasına öksürmekle geçmiş."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
